Reviews.Title: “A pleasant, friendly hotel, very close to Termini”

Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights amadeus water bathtub showering drain reported problem fixed wireless internet computer hotel guest people rely computers print boarding referred us internet cafe 8 front desk clerk arrogant asked help make reservation one museums breakfast nicely fresh dried fruit cup compared hotels stayed italy cost amadeus services

Reviews.Content: hotel small hotels venice hotel well run clean food high standard freshly prepared room nicely decorated venice style found hotel charming relaxing atmosphere nice section food suit tastes breakfast breakfast room opened enclosed courtyard gave italian villa feel hotel close attractions hotel excellent short stay holiday weekend break found staff helpful venice great place visit costs 1 euro marco airport takes 1015 minutes stroll hotel bus station buy travel pass good value money use water buses walk everywhere donâ€™t rush every street something see

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nigel2205
Reviews.Content: staff helpful friendly room lovely comfortable sleep air con slightly noisy location great near station vaporetti station also good walk venice hotel breakfast well served good selection

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: whyte85 Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: like another review read husband also stuck staying actually booking sister hotel principe hotel 50 away arrived principe looked name told us transferred hotel amadeus due air conditioning problems drag bags hotel amadeus people checking principe im really sure wouldnt recommend either one would guests seems common however put us pretty large room aside husband travel lot picky ask clean room nice staff members room fine staff completely ruined stay made feel pretty bad husband leaving hotel one night walk around everyone else taking keys us entire time didnt think leaving desk older man desk asked left husband simply said oh didnt know leave thats problem youre first person ask old man us said mean im first one tell stuff breath said going lock hotel soon confused asked would get shoulders still calm asked time said didnt know completely confused laid back people dont lot complaining ended picking water snacks came right back point thought maybe mix night ruined still okay point next morning approached tall younger man desk wondering door policy hotel first ignored us kept helping people came desk finally asked us said impossible whatever may mean asked locked said ring door bell someone come thats say instead added want complain go ahead write manager complaint card rudely told us impossible really wouldve fine simple explanation trying help us husband look fairly young give someone right treat us like really upset lot ive stayed many places never felt bad hard explain rude explanation pretty low key also noticed spoke especially dont speak italian noticed incident first arrived respect staff member nice older hair gentleman worked day often helpful cant remember name saved stay didnt talk anyone

Reviews.Title: “Ideal central hotel”
Reviews.Author: marie137
Reviews.Content: amadeus 35 minute walk railway station rooms average sized none rooms face water body around venice interiors nice breakfast standard eggs ham everyday like bread 2 days hotel 20 minute walk central area st marks square take stairs get room may confused due construction hotel hotel lane pizza next also sushi restaurant

Reviews.Title: “thoroughly recommend”
Reviews.Author: Tsturgess
Reviews.Content: great location friendly staff nice breakfast however room hot airconditioning added heat window open meant open season mosquitos lots noise

Reviews.Title: “A nice and very convenient location but rather disappointed with the rooms”
Reviews.Author: georgepap_10
Reviews.Content: friend managed get hotel really cheap part deal cost us great deal money well really really small hot room right top hotel view window hotel roof walls thin could pretty much hear every neighbours went loo etc room also favourite mosquitos visit came back home grand total 18 bites friend received 12 bites 5 face teacoffee making facilities room really suprised supposed 4 hotel staff friendly think even saw one crack smile visit breakfast quite nice although limited selection things stayed venice 2 nights ok needs certainly could stayed longer

Reviews.Title: “Great location, helpful staff, nice rooms! :)”
Reviews.Author: Melinda M
Reviews.Content: wife stayed night found hotel clean staff helpful courteous breakfast served excellent overall fantastic stay would stay

Reviews.Title: “interesting”
Reviews.Author: teargas
Reviews.Content: stayed amadeus 2 nights may part gate 1 tour supposed stay principe 50 yards away amadeus poor alternative owned group principe owners rate 4 star stayed 3 nights principe comparison principe better rooms restaurant bar patio grand canal better amadeus small old rooms real amenities tho breakfast room elevator 2 people principe 2 hold 10 booking prices list difference 15 euros principe worth far difference

Reviews.Title: “So small”
Reviews.Author: golisw
Reviews.Content: traveled venice april 2008 hotel 5 min train station main boat making easy get travel well maintained appears recently 3 years renovated staff great rooms especially bathrooms little small well appointed spotless breakfasts provided well done opportunity return venice make first choice locations

Reviews.Title: “Good Choice before cruise”
Reviews.Author: WisconsinRetired
Reviews.Content: overall nice pleasant hotel people front desk rude either room quality excellent rooms modern clean nice size bathroom theres room improvement far front desk staff friendliness goes bad people lack helping addition internet hotel meant whenever needed send emails review web go lobby different hotel nearby somewhat annoying

Reviews.Title: “Spotless and convenient”
Reviews.Author: MikeB45
Reviews.Content: located heart section venice hotel gem great service staff absolutely best cleanest rooms italy feel like staying rooms 14 foot high ceilings antique furniture italian wall extremely comfortable beds 24 inch flat panel tv round spacious rooms dining area first class free hot breakfast impressive think hot eggs bacon fresh pastries full coffee juice bar best part step outside luxurious hotel heart bustling main walkway stores restaurants main venice train station 3 minute walk public transport via water bus also 3 minute walk nice internet cafe 50 yards front door disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel : Excellent Location : Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: TractorJohn
Reviews.Content: booked hotel availability others excellent position close walking good restaurants rooms good central european standards clean quiet room overlooking quiet courtyard garden overall would stay based position standard room

Reviews.Title: “Good location decent sleep”
Reviews.Author: Tristan A
Reviews.Content: wife returned cruise venice stay three nights amadeus based tripadvisor reviews booked via orbitz cost per night also found price little high 3 star hotel disappointed thought requested superior room situated front part hotel nevertheless hotel fully booked ended 3rd floor room rear overlooking garden room bit small spend lot time around bed rear hotel resulted quiet peaceful sleep busy day room clean well maintained comfortable breakfasts adequate coffee machine made best individual cups expresso cafe american coffee machine want one front desk referred us ristorante dont miss venice also trattoria approximately 12 block left leave amadeus go past irish pub plain delicious traditional nuts view canal would definitely stay would request rear location less tourist traffic convenient past venice water taxi ride cost 90 euros airport 60 euros hotel cruise ship dock worth lot heavy luggage

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Ron R
Reviews.Content: well located lots reasonably priced cafes restaurants nearby together easy access public refreshing return quieter part venice busy day sightseeing crowded touristy areas rialto st marks hotel amadeus slightly overpriced thought basic hotel lobby nice rooms although clean comfortable basic small lighting poor even reading bed becomes impossible stayed 3 nights breakfast everyday decent bread make toast dry french toast rolls available warm breakfast scrambled egg bacon cannot agree reviews read amadeus people described breakfast enough lacked variety per night per room paid would expected slightly higher standards even city hotel get good deal hotel worth considering ok nights

Reviews.Title: “stayed at better”
Reviews.Author: beth r
Reviews.Content: returned wonderful trip italy excited stay hotel amadeus especially photos posted website unfortunately relied previous reviews travelers photos little much breakfast good nice selection choose garden pleasant room bed smallest ones encountered entire trip almost fell bed couple times also shower leaked floor got everytime took shower concierge nice recommended two great restaurants dinner price seemed little high 3 star hotel weekend overall would recommend hotel dont mind small bed room

Reviews.Title: “A Great Little Oasis”
Reviews.Author: TravellingPeteShow
Reviews.Content: stayed easter disappointed rooms clean lovely garden bonus dont know people complain lack free wifi terms clear read hotel web site 5 minutes termini quiet safe youre travelling alone plenty cheap places eat nearby well couple internet cafes breakfast buffet one best ive italy though coffee juice arent great food plentiful loads choice even provided little basket chocolate eggs easter sunday lovely staff let eat late woke late first morning recommended safe pleasant stay good transport links rome

Reviews.Title: “Feb´06”
Reviews.Author: migo23
Reviews.Content: recently stayed 3 nights astoria garden hotel rome first arrived hotel around allowed us check 2 hours early stated rooms small place 1 suitcase desk order able walk around bed however clean room balcony overlooking garden quite nice breakfast good mostly pastries breads meats cheeses convenience located 2 blocks termini station hotels best asset 1 problem establishment wifi although website states free wifi case receive 1 free hour wifi must password front desk 60 minutes starts moment password given 1 hour told access would longer free chose bother anymore quite inconvenient expecting free access overall good hotel pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “Good, cheap efficient hotel”
Reviews.Author: Geoff1980
Reviews.Content: hotel clean pleasant allocated double room second floor front room little small particularly bathroom would expected room tea coffee making facilities however buffet breakfast good start day reception staff pleasant helpful available time even made booking restaurant end road first night disappointed made second visit hotel close transport links within walking distance historic sites minutes away catch 40 express vatican 1 euro ideal also visited restaurant twice road rear hotel book restaurants disappointed nice atmosphere good food staff great restaurant across road avoided bedroom sockets near mirrors room economy lighting little dim opening shutters daylight essential bed extremely comfortable providing excellent sleep would recommend hotel would stay

Reviews.Title: “Tiny room but great environment!”
Reviews.Author: leat023
Reviews.Content: perfect location termini short walk sights hotel staff helpful even upgraded us room spacious clean

Reviews.Title: “Recommend this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: esjc
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel twice single room double rooms small opened lovely garden staff friendly helpful rooms clean location convenient termini breakfast buffet lovely

Reviews.Title: “Everything great...except the internet”
Reviews.Author: tallguy187
Reviews.Content: staff friendly convenient transport far away couldnt walk main attractions criticism room garden area lovely setting tad small could natural light

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and helpful staff, convenient location.”
Reviews.Author: DBrownCT
Reviews.Content: good friendly staff italian atmosphere clean rooms adequate breakfast buffet nice didnt make good impression given two rooms ground floor garden area rooms much smaller comparison main building rooms often heard tv form adjacent rooms couple times couldnt however ask upgrade room change hotel small almost fully booked due xmas vacations second disappointment came free wifi access management considered fact free wifi supposed given booking via directly overall enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant time in Rome”
Reviews.Author: extraordineri
Reviews.Content: stayed room mother also stayed hotel loved location hotel close termini felt safe quiet neighbourhood compared cities rome isnt really big lot walking termini station number sights accessible using rome metro lines lines go termini hotel staff helpful helping us book tours recommending places us eat visit giving us directions free breakfast isnt anything special disappointed croissants always hard free enough get us started day staff also worked breakfast area also pleasant mini rooms winter doors closed made good place store water things wanted keep cool bar downstairs able provide ice guests minimal amount would recommend hotel astoria garden families couples solo travelers great place stay reasonable price

Reviews.Title: “A Gem in the Heart of Rome”
Reviews.Author: kdjc
Reviews.Content: initially night met family stayed single room much bigger bed suffer would family room much better plenty room considering say european hotels breakfast good usual cereals staff nice enough hotel close main train station good access local areas overall pretty good

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: FussySam
Reviews.Content: see picture small room works fine one night several nights two suit cases later well crowded room quiet facing small garden hotel also quiet side street breakfast good price staff nice close dont recommend staying different area drag suitcases lots stairs walk termini buses national museum baths church st neighborhood felt fine late night hotel next good rating travel guide book

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant visit, friendly, helpful staff, well enjoyed!"”
Reviews.Author: trileaem
Reviews.Content: second morning hotel august 2011 wife went close shower door fell track wife received cuts hands feet work perfectly day hotel staff quickly attended problem however manager made comment would charged damage wife strongly told would ok next morning checked nothing said return back australia received email say charged credit card euro 300 repair advise hotel full control hotel room possibly cleaning staff may door wife went close came made pay full amount fact held us charging credit card would recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel to arrive in Roma”
Reviews.Author: linecemary
Reviews.Content: thoroughly enjoyed stay friendly hotel room entire facility immaculate management complimentary breakfast adequate blocks termini station quite easy walk hotel train ride fiumicino airport public transportation city readily available termini numerous restaurants even large grocery store extensive wine section couple blocks away question choose hotel rome wish could find place like every city

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel in every way”
Reviews.Author: 186605Anne
Reviews.Content: small clean one two quaint rooms lower floor small patio overlooking lovely quiet area first night tired go asked hotel could get us cold wine excellent white wine complete ice bucket real wine glasses little outdoor patio five weeks italy started well entire staff helpful pleasant many restaurants within 2 block walk five minutes termini

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, lovely rooms and a good location.”
Reviews.Author: spudqueen82
Reviews.Content: staff helpful assisting us tour rome allowed us see major attractions full day city anything needed quick chat away room quite good bed gave us decent couple nights sleep room balcony overlooking gardens made nice relaxation area staff reception bar courteous efficient street parking front hotel close station tours offer pick service hotel makes convenient decent hotel would stay

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay,i hope the owner reads this and takes care of his workers”
Reviews.Author: tsmagoo
Reviews.Content: overall good value bit issue one party broken plumbing resolved owner without problems good well run close bus lines train station room bit small bed bit hard overall ok

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for our stay”
Reviews.Author: Mike_and_Gill
Reviews.Content: second day shower handle broke hand owner hotel us way shower handle alone party walking tour proceeded around piece faces us cost 30 euro stood lobby needless say recommend hotel bc unprofessional attempted order drinks later trip got us asked ice gave attitude rest trip dont let speaks english well hotel nice ac cold rooms small true sizes hotel rooms europe

Reviews.Title: “Nice, friendly place”
Reviews.Author: terryseal
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights sister 10 year old son staff welcoming breakfast buffet good room typical size european hotel bathroom great definitely stay next trip rome

Reviews.Title: “5nights in Rome”
Reviews.Author: spock1701
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel last night rome close termini station convenient get early last day head airport room small clean bathroom nice friendly staff would recommend hotel need hotel night two longer trip would want stay somewhere centrally located

Reviews.Title: “An Oasis within busy Rome”
Reviews.Author: rapture_74
Reviews.Content: stayed night went cruise lovely hotel staff helpful emailed left received directions termini station even told exit take arrived early let us check room recommended local restaurant excellent hotel great location termini gives fantastic access sights either bus metro lots places eat nearby wish booked return stay rome fully booked decided would stay 2 nights coming home cruise

Reviews.Title: “LOVELY HOTEL, VERY NEAR TERMINI”
Reviews.Author: makemking
Reviews.Content: daughter come back rome pleasure staying lovely hotel booked recommendation friend could fault hotel quiet even though close termini nice restaurants nearby via 5 minute walk away number bus nowhere near make

Reviews.Title: “Great find”
Reviews.Author: capitalcitytiger
Reviews.Content: stayed june 4 nights great location excellent garden nice staffs shame breakfast nothing like photo website fruit juices fresh coffee cheap cereals love italian coffee start day dissapointed

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nathaniels_Uncle
Reviews.Content: great location near train station easy find noisy room quite small clean everything needed staff helpful friendly breakfast good selection breads cakes fruit yoghurt tea would definately recommend friends

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: mchy
Reviews.Content: stayed astoria two nights june part larger trip others mentioned really close major tourist sites thats plus close termini station every tourist theres downside location besides walking distance coliseum etc like walking plenty interesting sites right walking around piazza area towards coliseum city busy rome neighborhood bustling termini hotel quiet courtyard welcome bar service courtyard often us server wasnt issue get big beers mentioned elsewhere worth despite says hotel website wifi free booked hotels site since people go means people free charge 5 euros day first hour fine didnt know time booked complained pretty loudly website says free wifi finally give us albeit manner seemed like us super huge favor another issue lack inroom refrigerator fact seven hotels stayed italy hotel one maybe minor issue important us also breakfast coffee worst ever anywhere hotels taken using cannot cup coffee others hotels italy tired around rome must admit didnt even notice hard mattresses others complained far remember rooms cleanliness fine complaints us oh yeah terrible restaurant recommendation would recommend hotel astoria gardens nice budget hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Value in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Sutter93
Reviews.Content: mom stayed visiting rome nice clean hotel excellent breakfast nice staff available answer questions time close train station metro get places walked places except vatican complain beds super hard almost like sleeping floor would return rome sure hope replace time get back

Reviews.Title: “Well maintained hotel, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: ggllk
Reviews.Content: perfect location near termini good restaurants nearby quiet side street garden back perfect place us lunch grabbed supermarket across street laundry street gave us discount staying hotel front desk staff helpful answered questions directed us needed go bar nice great cappuccino delivered room breakfast nice well fresh croissants morning fresh fruit hotel great value chose based location fact safe room hair dryer breakfast included

Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff and location”
Reviews.Author: Gscott8075
Reviews.Content: quite impressed little hotel rooms clean comfortable little small side staff helpful friendly thank recommending made restaurant wonderful find close hard days walking reasonably priced ground floor room garden side lovely paid upgrade well worth hotel near bus station metro everything within walking distance want take sights way would thoroughly recommend hotel anyone wanting priced city break rome thanks astoria garden lovely city break

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, convenient, friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: EveSp
Reviews.Content: spent 6 nights astoria garden hotel rome april 2011 everything fully acceptable room clean comfortable staff pleasant helpful included breakfast pleasant even coffee bit strong taste astoria garden hotel tiny city hotel standards would recommend highly

Reviews.Title: “Uncomfortable stay bordering on creepy”
Reviews.Author: CaveatConsumers
Reviews.Content: found hotel good value rates paid expected except maybe size rooms small comfortable view garden plus capital

Reviews.Title: “Glad we found this hotel on Trip Advisor”
Reviews.Author: cheshireangel
Reviews.Content: come back weekend rome stayed astoria garden say great arrival given great friendly welcome also given upgrade lovely room overlooking beautiful garden oranges lovely peaceful oasis right middle location excellent couple minutes away termini station used metro handy going much trouble staff every one always greeted us room spotless whole return night nightcap lovely well stocked good kept us going day would highly recommend hope day come back stay

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: gonetotraveleurope
Reviews.Content: hotel recommended would also recommend paid extra picked airport taken back efficient arrival warmly greeted questions answered room clean bed turned comfortable doors lead terrace overlooking small pretty garden complete orange trees tip shower open tap part way keep temperature constant rather fully open breakfast buffet style repeated daily enough choice vary ate staff reception bar friendly recommended excellent local restaurant ate twice menu italian helped enjoyed food location north termini walked every day found everything accessible enjoyed walking see however buses available termini enjoyable back rome staying astoria garden

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel, clean & comfortable, room a bit small”

Reviews.Content: great breakfast someone spoke main thing first time rome visitor close termini right close astoria many hotels say treated would stay trevi fountain wish came true hope owner 3 blocks termini station hotels right across street wouldnt take chance less quality correct word

Reviews.Title: “Great find!”
Reviews.Author: happylittlebuddha
Reviews.Content: staying 2 nights rome cruise wanted something close termini station take leonardo express rome airport prepare long walk platform main body station make head via exit 510 minute walk hotel arrived bags taken us street member staff quickly completed check shown garden room room everything needed comfortable double bed television couple english news channels outside table two chairs despite november warm enough sit outside gentleman reception kindly recommended close restaurant around corner perfect us stopped well stocked bar night cap return great end first evening rome booked garden room bed breakfast rate around per night double room great value buffet breakfast offered variety breads cereals cheese meat hot cold drinks perfectly adequate hotel also great location sightseeing metro bus network termini station although sightseeing foot looking stock food drink small supermarket via entrance lower floor termini station room hotel spotlessly clean everything exactly described website would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “clean and warm,small room average location”
Reviews.Author: AgentAC
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay first time rome picked good reviews site proximity roma termini going traveling via train end stay desk managers friendly helpful dinner suggestions neighborhood nice cappuccino arrived room bit small side plenty comfortable

Reviews.Title: “great location, reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: sunshine2305
Reviews.Content: lucky stay good hotelthe staff wonderful nothing much trouble always helpful advice bus routes rome general breakfast good cooked meats etc room clean plenty big enough cleaned daily fresh towels garden area added thanks staff great stay weather wet stay meant see lot ancient city outside although manage colosseum hill give vatican wonderful must amazing ciampino airport used mainly cheaper airlines small dont eager go passport control like coming back find couple vending machines awful seats cafe get taxi tofrom airport city centre use white cabs set prepared approached guy wanting said pointed us direction white cabs rome expensive comes eating expect pay glass beer never got away less dinner warned prices cities quite shocked however find great wee pizza round corner hotel called run lovely couple served wonderful pizza pizza great value always case friday morning left weather dry

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: emj_10 Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed four nights august enjoyed stay upon rather early arrival upgraded garden view room balcony thank staff much since days rome hot always good come back hotel nice view garden breakfast good however orange juice taste like real orange juice hotel great value money come back rome definitely staying 510 mins walk main train station regards

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: mel0325
Reviews.Content: building interesting rooms impeccably maintained courtyard great place sit talk staff helpful assisting checked still

Reviews.Title: “Good location, especially for travelling to/from both of Rome's airports”
Reviews.Author: slk86
Reviews.Content: walked hotel next last day 10 day run italy rate reasonable room great staff extremely helpful location great would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Rooms clean, staff friendly and location superb”
Reviews.Author: twoplustwoLancashire
Reviews.Content: hotel well worth money rooms fine location great courtyard garden great place need escape rome air con worked really well huge plus us rome crazy hot front desk hop guy friendly mentioned hard beds hard bed italy got great sleep hard bed two small sides hotel one water temperature shower go chilly manager makes quite clear customers really must said ignored everyone else super

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is great. Manager is EXTREMELY RUDE.”
Reviews.Author: travellingeducator
Reviews.Content: last stop italy tour 2 adults 2 kids 9 booked room ill start pros cute little hotel lovely garden area central location sightseeing rooms balconies andor leading garden area cons rooms extremely small compared 3 4 star hotels stayed room balcony dark booked room euros taxes per night upon arrival disappointed rooms size given price asked desk told options second day stay discovered current rate room euros reasonable rate room management refused work us rate end offered another room small balcony last night decided wasnt worth trouble pack one night beware rates prepared small room size lovely place great location oh says add full breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Almost perfect”
Reviews.Author: matrix67
Reviews.Content: originally picked hotel seemed though managers must care respond negative tripadvisor pleased stay hotel rome good great location helpful staff great price get wont find better value rome nice clean rooms air conditioned allowed us store bags bad little bit noise street sleep busy area near termini sound minimal dont listen negative reviews stay 4star hotels italy even close standards 3star hotel thank astoria garden

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, great value”
Reviews.Author: tampatraveler89
Reviews.Content: hotel course luxury hotel feels much better hotels hanging 3star sign doorstep owner obviously cares property guests rare enough noticed clean suspect renovated long ago single room expected quite small seen much worse air conditioning room great plus breakfast simple yet enjoyable pastries cereals cheese ham salami staff nice helpful well ready answer questions location minutes walk termini station main station also close bus allow virtually reach major spot city conclusion great value money wish hotels like one

Reviews.Title: “It is the Garden that makes it special.”
Reviews.Author: citroenbill
Reviews.Content: used astoria gardens home base spending two weeks europe staff incredibly friendly offered assistance whenever possible helped us variety ways cannot speak enough taking care guests first time rome location extremely convenient considering needed use termini several occasions move around overnight left cruise came back two nights went came back last night trip recommended good restaurants within walking distance offered keep luggage trips arranged airport transportation thanks wonderful stay

Reviews.Title: “A Perfect Choice”

Reviews.Content: spent first two nights 3 week trip italy coast astoria garden hotel us leisure travelers everything wanted convenient rome termini station clean bathroom clean comfortable bed extremely quiet good breakfast friendly staff provided directions locations like via required using subway bus good restaurant recommendations french window ground floor room opened patio table chairs within garden area room simply furnished relatively small found bed comfortable particularly impressed fact room quiet ate restaurants recommended front desk evenings told restaurants sent astoria garden hotel given free end meals

Reviews.Content: years since wed rome booked budget flights surprised find much hotel prices gone therefore searching reasonably priced place stay werent expecting high quality wanted somewhere convenient clean well organised reasonable cost exactly got astoria garden initial minute left friendly organised next go rome would definitely use hotel close termini therefore underground bus terminal great getting also reasonably priced place eat wood pizza around corner slight negative getting one pillow hard mattress

Reviews.Title: “Loved this little hotel”
Reviews.Author: LindaMc_8
Reviews.Content: great hotel staff wonderful speak english breakfast good rooms small need great location trains would stay

Reviews.Title: “Got what we paid for”
Reviews.Author: TexBecks
Reviews.Content: fantastic find rome close roma termini station less 5 mins walk beware train station night brother got pick hotel clean comfortable overall cleanliness impressive room quite small room double bed 2 singles one single beds placed foot double bed like much space balcony overlooking gardens nice big doors opened plenty fresh air cupboard room well safe free breakfast ok staff extremely helpful polite good experience hotel wifi available laptop 5 euro 24 hours

Reviews.Title: “Ok but more like 2.5 star”
Reviews.Author: LordoBristol
Reviews.Content: glad found hotel location perfect short walk termini station staff extremely friendly helpful especially tips tickets termini airport room bit small european hotel room isnt bathroom good size nice size shower little gem

Reviews.Title: “Central location ,Good value”
Reviews.Author: BDHwindsor
Reviews.Content: located block away train station moving around city metro easy taxi rides 10 euro main attractions pleasant location specially night due station clean warm room room single larger boat paper thin walls breakfast nothing standard 1 hour free wifi access 5 euro recommend hotel visit without small children service good

Reviews.Title: “ok, not great, avoid single room”
Reviews.Author: Alceste
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3 nights february hotel located 3 minutes walking distance termini station easy get anywhere want staff friendly helpful room small nice cozy clean enjoyed stay much would definitely recommend place go back rome use astoria garden hotel

Reviews.Title: “Could NOT stay for 1 night”
Reviews.Author: LondonBeachbum
Reviews.Content: booked trip rome mainly watch wanted cheap hotel sight seeing hotel lovely clean well located close termini walked locations prepared walk brilliant beds comfortable experienced find couple nights hotel evening meals expected quite restaurants around corner try corner enjoyed

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Great service Lovely room”
Reviews.Author: OscarTheTraveller
Reviews.Content: stayed astoria garden hotel january 30 february 2 pleased stay close roma termini great staff extremely friendly helpful hotel beautiful rooms little small traveling perfect size husband come think room still would perfect size con noticed pay wifi first free hour 5 euros per 24 hour period definitely better rate hotels europe recommended hotel friend mine traveling rome year continue recommend definitely stay next time city highly highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Rome's answer to Fawlty Towers”
Reviews.Author: BasilFawltyLondonUK
Reviews.Content: staff helpful friendly clean rooms bathrooms loved bed mornings great value would stay

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Honeymooner010
Reviews.Content: couldnt fly rome bad weather conditions called hotel asking anything could get type refund said rude receptionist said look charge full fee within 24 hours even though wasnt fault couldnt fly rome advice later get easyjet pay hotel cant control weather said hung incredibly rude find hotels policy even little bit amazingly stupid offered pay half booking yet said look get money lot bad stay hotel careful

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: youngatheart53
Reviews.Content: little concerned adventure dont go holiday would get bad start flight rome arrive midnight thought hotel may let room arrived mind emailed hotel surprised get reply english everything order good start get taxi airport leonardo express finished service time night warning taxi two factor nine stop hotel three blocks away station asked driver take us termini could walk rest way didnt trust take us hotel without us ladies alone dont recommend walk night arrived hotel locked doors thankfully duty manager came door almost immediately efficient checking us even asked us would like drink bar 12 hours travelling exactly needed offered us seat garden september night long journey peaceful room small yes comfortable yes clean absolutely spotless 1010 bathroom absolutely spotless shower little bit smallest aint biggest either bed ever come across dont mind extra pillows would good im sure asked would provided want trouble fully recommend hotel body cleanliness staff brilliant helpful courteous garden joy especially cold beer good book

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs Up”
Reviews.Author: evelynyeager
Reviews.Content: final stop rome returning canada think great hotel location close termini less walk luggage moment walked greeted smile gentleman ready take bags stairs show us around property check smooth english clean room bathroom beds hard one thin pillow lay head continental breakfast average compared suggest tea coffee also fruits nice overall great stay

Reviews.Title: “Good for going in and out of Rome.”
Reviews.Author: suzt
Reviews.Content: partner stayed hotel four nights august airport bus dropped us termini station hotel within 5 mins walked station hotel easy find greeted friendly receptionist shown room straight away room quite small prepared adequate bathroom spotless quite spacious also delighted see could open patio doors room walk onto lovely patio table chairs area looking onto garden orange trees breakfast every morning included cereal juice lots types bread cheese ham yoghurts choice fruit lots everything tasty little thing orange juice wasnt real orange juice like drink breakfast great hotel nice busy area lots hotels restaurants never walk 5 minutes dinner suited wearing streets pleased location near termini station used metro lot get around convenient however slight downside location would kind wrong side termini relation sights would quite walk afraid hotel would disappointment need worried terrific days astoria garden hotel thrilled reasonable cost

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Garden at Astoria”
Reviews.Author: Chelle64
Reviews.Content: pleased hotel choice staff welcoming helpful hotel smart clean room somewhat small knew booking importantly comfortable clean quiet good size shower breakfast good stay would orange juice minor detail small garden added bonus quiet cup tea drink end tiring day sightseeing situated hub things still within walking distance plenty major sights plenty restaurants nearby

Reviews.Title: “loved the hotel”
Reviews.Author: polastar
Reviews.Content: husband went weekend rome hotel good placed close termini however think would hard find comfortable hotel close termini astoria garden hotel hotel clean fresh give rooms extremely small bathrooms school covered graffiti noisy beds must made horribly hard breakfast horrible croissants bread felt like week easy please much even 700 monday bread bad sorry would never go recommend look nearby hotel many around neighbourhood

Reviews.Title: “All we needed”
Reviews.Author: braq24
Reviews.Content: six us 3 couples stayed mid march absolutely enjoyed stay checkin smooth fast ever helpful receptionists rooms previous reviews said indeed small side average really europe spotlessly clean cleaned towels etc day shower excellent breakfast buffet continental style cheeses breads etc adequate receptionists really able assist including bus routes restaurants etc bonus really pretty garden hotel seating areas hotel perfect 3 minutes walk romes central station called termini great restaurants nearby spent night 2 pub nearby called yellow bar lively reasonable rome standards rome great city second time hopefully back would hesitation staying

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: Stephen S
Reviews.Content: given run around hotel pleasantly surprised astoria garden hotel comfortable pleasant hotel 4 blocks termini get tourist sightseeing buses trains hotel seems like small oasis sea concrete city rome service friendly helpful breakfast buffet continental style plenty choose whilst try block behind hotel food service great may wait table worth beware portions large

Reviews.Title: “Great way to start our vacation”
Reviews.Author: WorldTravelers5051
Reviews.Content: loved little hotel much staff desk went way help sorts information various things nothing much problem room small per rome standards garden area real bonus location far enough away hustle bustle termini station would hesitation staying astoria garden

Reviews.Title: “A decent little hotel.”
Reviews.Author: WestonSaint
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 weeks ago got paid clean place sleep shower location short walk termini great travelers stopping rome short time front desk staff helpful even porter help us bags room wasnt especially large comfortable lighting dim beds rock major drawback room bathroom generous size european hotels toiletries needed breakfast standard european breakfast fare bread cheese meats yogurt fruit juice coffee decent place stay one night stay longer wouldve looked elsewhere comfortable bed

Reviews.Title: “Good location but staff could be a little obstructive”
Reviews.Author: Setch
Reviews.Content: mostly youd expect 3star hotel little things let though suggest popular showering times hot water get cold room furniture doesnt really matter bit irritating shower door quiet closing properly loose staff helpful continental cold breakfast youd expect aside orange juice surprise

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: KazMeath
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights good price helpful staff good sized lower level ok much bit worn kept stay rome next

Reviews.Title: “Controlling and Strange”
Reviews.Author: Teech34
Reviews.Content: read lot previous reviews one reasons booked astoria garden cracked needed take early flight room ready arrived fine expected arrive 11am went get lunch came back two half hours later unfortunately room still wasnt ready sat read another half hour really tired time got room shocked tiny room say previous reviews must based rooms explained standard double booked room offered website yet pictures provided much larger room work travel agent would class room single double bed smallest kind one half feet around bed wardrobe pushed cant put suitcase flat floor enough room suitcase would needed keep one reception tried shower barely managed fit average size large side lot trouble shower wasnt bath tiny also bed extremely hard wanted see thick mattress didnt feel couple inches wooden unfortunately 6 inches thick uncomfortable decided couldnt stay room asked pay upgrade werent rooms available looked another hotel found 200 euros night double price know quality checked night charged one nights stay return found rude email telling card another night fine could done without rudeness suppose story get pay want stay please make sure call superior room

Reviews.Title: “Buyer beware”
Reviews.Author: jz52
Reviews.Content: fantastic 2 night stay august 2008 staff brilliant keeping luggage extra half day booked recommending great restaurants evenings friendly professional two rooms great ensuite facilities beautifully furnished clean air conditioning essential august breakfast provided plenty choose hotel easy walking distance train station made perfect us definately recommend hotel trevi fountain make sure come back rome well staying

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Traveling_with_son
Reviews.Content: husband really liked hotel arrived staff fantastic one garden rooms would highly recommend honeymoon brought us champagne room wasnt large size clean tidy staff really helpful giving information booking tour us breakfast continental best hotels stayed honeymoon selection location great close buses metro little side street dont get traffic noise restaurants area fantastic internet place street extremely hot air conditioning great worked really well would cool room quickly area around hotel safe could walk around night concerns stayed 6 days go back roma would stay front desk staff english speaking helpful us think supposed restaurant hotel open stay think thing improve room would mini fridge think hotel excellent value money would recommend lovely hotel room start honeymoon

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Staff at the Astoria Garden”
Reviews.Author: gmanssa
Reviews.Content: great staff duty 24 hours day nothing much trouble spoke good english huge help whole place clean would stay book garden room next time small enclosed garden lovely

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: hawiiansky
Reviews.Content: stayed four nights astoria garden excellent hotel room good size bed comfortable desk people helpful free european breakfast nice room little balcony overlooking garden nice hotel located near bus line made easy access major sites several nice resturants near hotel well even street needed tv one english channel problem parking available street internet price quality location excellent value

Reviews.Title: “Good location - decent value - small rooms - horrible breakfast”
Reviews.Author: dctravelWashington
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 day stay coast early morning plane ride rome hotel decent 4 block walk termini front desk staff rude gave us information nasty top breakfast decent youre using hotel like fine go somewhere else

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Traveler0123
Reviews.Content: nice place stay close train easy catch public transportation nice restaurants nearby staff best part stay really genuine helpful grazie

Reviews.Title: “good location close to train station”
Reviews.Author: nobley
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel one night expected cheap clean good breakfast close termini area scary would stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Central Location”
Reviews.Author: jollybee
Reviews.Content: stayed astoria garden hotel first trip italy first stop landing place real nice inside rooms tiny usually case anywhere breakfasts yogurt bread etc easily filled enough take us good part morning staff took suitcases upon arriving brought room checked also hold key leave one less thing worry reception 24 hours day never issue key dont know italian worries everyone spoke perfect english also nice view garden outside nice close termini quiet neighborhood traveling students make sure take advantage discount book found booked able give us upon arriving since prepaid

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for the sights”
Reviews.Author: stewyNewcastle
Reviews.Content: returned long weekend astoria garden perfectly positioned termini short walk centre rome got warm greeting arrived cases carried room one garden rooms room looked though recently built although small spotlessly clean kept way stay bathroom modern shower breakfast ham cheese cereal fruit croissants choice pastries teacoffee complaints breakfast negative lack teacoffee making facilities room understand thats quite common rome apart hotel great tended eat around piazza barberini found great restaurant called food great price also ate thats across road food great bit modern restaurant dinner night sat outside bar piazza barberini patio watching world go thoroughly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice Enough”
Reviews.Author: julcull
Reviews.Content: husband arrived exhausted hotel astoria gardens early hours 7 30 trip could go directly room stored luggage us gave us directions helpful advice seeing rome room nice clean bugs always see bugs experience hotel short walk around corner termini station one block supermarket purchased meat cheese beer water found much like us water end street hotel great restaurant rather contemporary served good food also across street internet point 1 euro hour even kind suggested new bought one sold without used rest trip without would stay without hesitation

Reviews.Title: “Great Value - Very Good Room”
Reviews.Author: feelcurious
Reviews.Content: location great staff really nice breakfast good compared breakfasts hotels italy choices eg yogurt fruits etc stayed small think everywhere else good looks really clean husband stayed 4 nights november everything seems fine 3rd sitting bed looking map go next day husband suddenly start hitting bug bug blood took look yes bed bug wanted change room husband 1 would hassle unpack rooms might even worse bed pillows blankets checked floor bed husbands maid probably brought theres really bugs room decided stick room husband felt really sensitive skin couldnt sleep 3rd requested lights wake check make probably woken every hour check even wearing long holding onto next morning dont seem find bites body figure okay stay room made sure luggage husband book bag left bag inside checked luggage making sure would carrying bugs back well 4th night hotel little slept still woke double bites well overall good deal one bed bug really problem told hotel didnt remember per review sure heard similar complaints hopefully havent brought still staying rome went florence 3 nights venice 2 returning home 2nd night back home found bite marks 2 3 bites across hand started bite marks found similar bed bug whether brought started whole house everything okay see thing dont know bites hotel florence hotel venice per google may know bites time cant seem believe bites may taken 810 days show hoping gotten venice bring bugs home x suggestion dont care bugs important hotel bad go ahead take risk taking back really wanted give hotel better average ratings personally really hate bugs skin sensitive risk regret changing hotel found bug husbands leg probably would also husband found bites 23 bites across 4 night trip

Reviews.Author: MandarineBlossom
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed astoria garden booked hotel good ratings especially cleanliness room third floor obviously quite recently renovated first impression positive problems started however almost immediately especially girlfriend started everywhere later got big red spots first couldnt figure point didnt problems yet third morning saw insect sheet insect blood checked bed turned one pillows big brown insect took whole pillow showed guy reception insect immediately explained really first time insect came probably street garden also promised us another room got quite happy paid advance accepted offer hoped best new room really small bad condition asked bigger room following day got one first floor moved find type insect checked internet found german point didnt trust staff decided leave asked staff give us money back days supposed stay one week refused course lucky find room palace hotel next two nights palace last night rome hotels ok long holiday spoiled obvious hotel talk issue guests decided didnt want spoil holiday didnt others problem wondering later read people even realize bugs hardly get sensitive ones like poor girlfriend get bites constantly bad luck choosing hotel suffer problem trip also might carry bugs home suitcase cannot recommend astoria garden hotel anyone

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money”
Reviews.Author: annden
Reviews.Content: girlfriend wife since visiting europe stayed hotel several nights july 2007 travelled rome used tripadvisor help select hotel following important features 1 value money 2 clean 3 good airconditioning 4 located safe central area found hotel excellent yes room small required little bit couple large suitcases sits room quick break sleep addition although hotel located blocks roma termini street quiet windows seem double glazed quiet bathroom also small appeared recently refurbished worked well previous posts water temperature shower bit however didnt find much problem must agree earlier comments breakfast simple however great start day fruit drink cereals toast fruit sliced meat cheese coffee basic pastries price paid room came nice experience staff good booked us tours wanted go vatican etc waited reception generally good english assist us couple small negatives hotel 1 maid service room seemed late day well lunch least one often back rest around time would appreciated complete 2 checking hotel required provide id passports us dont problem showing letting quickly record passport numbers security reasons insisted keeping hour two sure overall extremely happy standard provided astoria garden hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed astoria garden hotel son husband overall happy choice rooms indeed small think cell small rome hang hotel room wasnt issue us bathroom spotlessly clean beautiful updated tile inroom safe nice touch issues hotel put disturb sign door first day however every day hotel staff came cleaned room put sign door travel information room didnt need cleaned anyway dont change sheets home everyday sign removed room thoroughly cleaned appreciate clean room however think respect sign trying sleep breakfast also pretty lady worked breakfast every morning tried best make pieces cheese nice etc however fresh rolls would much nicer also tables available every time went nice hint seem take rolls later maybe use first two relatively minor issues really enjoy hotel would definitely stay room overlooked gardens back never heard noise night every night husband enjoyed bottle wine garden son slept upstairs staff helpful directions recommendations spoke perfect english owner hotel little grumpy wasnt often clearly took great beautiful hotel make sure go know exactly hotel even though really blocks termini station station huge street names numbers rome arrived termini address ended wandering luggage hour finally paid cab take us hotel

Reviews.Title: “nice and cosy though small”

Reviews.Content: got hotel desk manager problems reservation showed orbitz voucher claimed reservation computer luckily said stay sister hotel dont pay extra pay extra sister hotel hotel select gem disappointed done lots research booked room five months early end somewhere considered
